INVALID_API_KEY.description: API key provided is not valid.
INVALID_API_KEY.fix: Please check that you have entered the correct API key. If the issue persists, generate a new API key.

ACCESS_DENIED.description: Not enough permissions to access this endpoint.
ACCESS_DENIED.fix: Ensure that your account has the required permissions to access this endpoint.

REQUEST_LIMIT_EXCEEDED.description: Exceeded maximum number of allowed requests.
REQUEST_LIMIT_EXCEEDED.fix: Wait for the reset period to pass, or consider updating a higher request limit in your configuration.

DATABASE_CONNECTION_ERROR.description: Failed to establish a connection to the database.
DATABASE_CONNECTION_ERROR.fix: Verify your database credentials and network settings. If the issue persists, check if the database server is running.

PASSWD_FILE_NOT_FOUND.fix: The /etc/passwd file was not found in the specified path. Check if the file is present and the service has the required permissions.

PASSWD_FILE_PERMISSION_DENIED.fix: Ensure the service has the appropriate permissions to read the /etc/passwd file.

NO_USERS_FOUND.description: No users found matching the specified criteria.
NO_USERS_FOUND.fix: Ensure there are users that match the provided status or criteria.

UNEXPECTED_ERROR.description: This error is not listed or not known.
UNEXPECTED_ERROR.fix: Report this error to the dev team with relevant details, including what actions led to the error, so we can investigate.

CHAGE_COMMAND_FAILED.description: Failed to retrieve user password details using the chage command.
CHAGE_COMMAND_FAILED.fix: Ensure the chage command is installed and accessible with sufficient permissions.

CHAGE_COMMAND_NOT_FOUND.description: The chage command was not found on the system.
CHAGE_COMMAND_NOT_FOUND.fix: Install the chage utility or verify your PATH environment variable.

CHAGE_PERMISSION_DENIED.description: Permission denied while attempting to run the chage command.
CHAGE_PERMISSION_DENIED.fix: Run the command with elevated privileges or adjust user permissions.
